title: Commending the members of the New Hyde Park Memorial High School Key Club in recognition of their extensive charitable efforts and distinguished community service
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commending the members of the New Hyde Park Memo-
rial  High  School Key Club in recognition of their extensive charitable
efforts and distinguished community service

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to act, in accord with
its long-standing traditions, honoring the youth of today,  and  leaders
of  tomorrow, whose character and achievements best exemplify the ideals
and values cherished by this great State and Nation; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative Body is justly proud to commend
the members of the New Hyde Park Memorial High School Key Club in recog-
nition of their extensive charitable efforts and distinguished community
service; and
  WHEREAS, The 75 members of the New Hyde Park Memorial High School  Key
Club,  a branch of the New Hyde Park Kiwanis Club, collaborated with the
Nassau County Department of Social Services to identify 10  families  in
need  within  their  community;  the  Key Club members set up a food and
clothing drive at their school,  collecting  much  needed  materials  to
bring these families warmth and comfort for a happy holiday season; and
  WHEREAS,  The  benevolent  efforts  of the New Hyde Park Memorial High
School Key Club raised the consciousness of its members  who  ultimately
visited the families to distribute the food and clothes; and
  WHEREAS,  In addition, the New Hyde Park Memorial High School Key Club
collected between 300 and 400 toys to donate to families though a facil-
ity in Hempstead that received and distributed toys; and
  WHEREAS, Faculty co-sponsors, Linda Bocchino and Michele  Pesce,  have
done  a  superb job in guiding, molding and inspiring the members of the
New Hyde Park Memorial High School Key Club; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this  Legislative  Body  that  when  young
people  of such noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be celebrated and recognized by all  the  citizens  of
this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commend the members of the New Hyde Park Memorial High School  Key  Club
of  Nassau,  New  York,  in  recognition  of  their extensive charitable
efforts and distinguished community service; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the New Hyde Park Memorial High School Key Club.
